about_the_game:
This is a retro-inspired game that pursues the fun of block crumbling.

The design is reminiscent of the PCs of the 80s, creating a nostalgic atmosphere.

Features of the game

There are more than 30,000 different block placement patterns, and they are different every time.

The difficulty level automatically changes between EASY, NORMAL, and HARD.

The speed of the ball can be selected between FAST and SLOW.

Faces appear in the stage at 50% chance.

When you defeat a face, you will get a bonus of 1000 to 3000 points.

There is a HP gauge, and the game is over after 8 misses.

When all blocks are destroyed, the ending is displayed.

To avoid an infinite loop, the position of the ball changes a little when it hits the upper edge.

About the game

We went back to the basics of ball games and pursued simple fun. We love games that bounce off poles like block breakers and pong, and in order to maximize their appeal, we dared not incorporate items or unbreakable blocks. We focused on the pure fun of breaking blocks with player technique, and by changing the block patterns each time, we created a game that can be enjoyed over and over again. We hope you will enjoy this game to the fullest.

[Story

Invasion of Faces -Restore Peace with Balls

One day, the world suddenly fell into chaos. It was because a giant, face-only being called “Face” appeared from the sky. Without warning, the “Face” appeared in several cities and countries, staring at us, and no weapons would work. The strange force instilled anxiety and fear in people's hearts, and the world gradually sank into chaos.

Cities collapsed one after another, the government and the military were out of options, and people were in despair. However, there was one person among them who was determined to take a stand. It was an ordinary young man, a nameless “you.

name: TRUMP BREAKOUT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 11,10,8.1,8,7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 615 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
